back.name: Ilmenite Semiconductor Film
back.ability: POWER GIRDLE: If used to industrialize a non-atmospheric site of size 8+, you permanently gain the Powersat faction privilege.

back.name: Von Neumann Santa Claus Machine
back.ability: DIVINING NUBOTS: -1 ISRU for Colocated ISRU platform.

back.name: Carbonyl Volatilization
back.ability: THORIUM BREEDER: -3 to Colocated size rolls on S Sites.

back.name: Solar Carbotherm
back.ability: ARCOLOGY: Decommissioning of a robonaut is not needed when this is used to industrialize in the zones Mercury, Venus, Earth

back.name: Impact Mold Sinter
back.ability: FOAMED NICKEL: -1 to Colocated size rolls.

back.name: Atmospheric Scoop
back.ability: SCOOP: If operational, this card makes adjacent or colocated aerostat sites into [2 hydration]

back.name: Laser-Heated Pedestal Growth
back.ability: SUPERLENS: -1 to all Colocated raygun size rolls.

back.name: Femtochemistry
back.ability: SCAVENGING: If Colocated, doubles FTs during site refuel.

back.name: Biophytolytic Algal Farm
back.ability: COMET LICHEN: -2 to Colocated size rolls on D Sites.

back.name: Termite Nest
back.ability: MINE REVIVAL: As an op, remove a busted disk and place Claim on a Colocated Site of Size 2+.

back.name: Ionosphere Lasing
back.ability: IONOSAT: If used to industrialize an Atmospheric Site, permanently gain the Powersat faction privilege.

back.name: Solid Flame
back.ability: JELLYBOTS: Colocated industrialization is a free action.
